topic.title: Adding a Distribution List
topic.p: Distribution lists are stored in your Address Book. The list name and at least one contact must be provided.

ol.title: To add a new list:

li.p: In the Address Book menu group, click Add List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary).
The Add Distribution List window appears.

ol.li: Type the list name you want in the List Name field.
Type a nickname in the Nickname field, if you want one.
In the left column, select the name you want to add to the list and click Add >. The selected name appears in the right column. Repeat this step until you have added all the names you want.
Type any comments you want in the Description field and click Save or Save/Create Another. A message appears informing you that your list has been added.
